DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study compare change body weight technology-based system , in-person behavioral weight loss intervention , combination 12 month behavioral weight loss intervention adult . Sedentary , healthy overweight obese adult recruit participate . Assessments conduct 0 , 6 , 12 month . This randomized trial participant randomize one three group : standard behavioral weight loss ( SBWL ) , standard behavioral weight loss plus technology ( SBWL+TECH ) , technology alone alone ( TECH ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Comparison Technology-Based System In-Person Behavioral Weight Loss Intervention
DOC.criteria: age 2155 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 2539.9 kg/m2 Currently pregnant , pregnant last 6 month , plan become pregnant next 6 month . Currently participate regular exercise 60 minutes/week . Taking medication affect body weight metabolism ( e.g . synthroid ) . Have physical limitation would prevent exercise . Currently treat coronary heart disease , diabetes mellitus , hypertension , cancer . Have history myocardial infarction heartrelated surgery . Have rest systolic blood pressure > 150 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg currently take medication affect blood pressure heart rate ( e.g . beta blocker ) . Currently enrol commercial weight loss program , participate another weight loss study , weight loss study last 12 month . Have lose > 5 % current body weight past 6 month . Currently treated psychological problem take psychotropic medication . Currently access computer Internet use study . This require PC computer , ability load software technology system , exist internet connection provide participant , dedicate USB port allow armband technology system connect computer download information .
